Name: Welcome New Contact
Subject: Welcome to {{CompanyName}} - Let's Get Started
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

Thank you for connecting with us! We're excited to have you on board.

At {{CompanyName}}, we're committed to providing exceptional service and building lasting relationships. Here's what you can expect from us:

- A dedicated point of contact for all your needs
- Regular updates on products and services relevant to you
- Priority access to our latest offerings

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need assistance.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Send to new contacts when they are first added to the CRM

Name: New Customer Welcome
Subject: Welcome Aboard, {{CustomerName}}!
Body:
Dear {{CustomerName}},

Welcome to the {{CompanyName}} family! We're thrilled to have you as a customer.

Your account has been set up and you're ready to go. Here are some important details:

- Your dedicated account manager: {{SenderName}}
- Support email: support@company.com
- Support hours: Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM

We've attached our getting started guide to help you make the most of our products and services.

Looking forward to a successful partnership!

Warm regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Welcome email for newly converted customers

Name: Lead Follow-Up
Subject: Following Up on Our Conversation
Body:
Hi {{ContactName}},

I wanted to follow up on our recent conversation about how {{CompanyName}} can help with your needs.

As discussed, I believe our solutions could significantly benefit your organization by:

- [Key benefit 1]
- [Key benefit 2]
- [Key benefit 3]

Would you be available for a brief call this week to discuss next steps? I'm happy to work around your schedule.

Please let me know what works best for you.

Best,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Follow up with leads after initial contact or meeting

Name: Opportunity Proposal
Subject: Proposal for {{OpportunityName}}
Description: Send proposal details for an opportunity

Name: Deal Won Confirmation
Subject: Congratulations! Your Agreement with {{CompanyName}}
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

We're delighted to confirm that everything is finalized for {{OpportunityName}}!

Here's a summary of what happens next:

1. Our implementation team will reach out within 48 hours
2. You'll receive your official documentation via email
3. Your dedicated success manager will schedule an onboarding call

Thank you for choosing {{CompanyName}}. We're committed to making this a successful partnership.

If you have any immediate questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Confirmation email when an opportunity is closed/won

Name: Deal Lost Follow-Up
Subject: Thank You for Your Consideration
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

I appreciate the time you spent evaluating {{CompanyName}} for your needs. While I understand you've decided to go in a different direction, I want you to know that we value the relationship.

If circumstances change or if there's anything we can help with in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out.

I'd also appreciate any feedback you could share about your decision - it helps us improve our offerings.

Wishing you all the best,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Professional follow-up when an opportunity is lost

Name: Meeting Request
Subject: Meeting Request: {{MeetingTopic}}
Body:
Hi {{ContactName}},

I'd like to schedule a meeting to discuss {{MeetingTopic}}.

Proposed Details:
- Date: [Proposed Date]
- Time: [Proposed Time]
- Duration: [Duration]
- Location/Format: [In-person/Virtual]

Agenda:
1. [Agenda item 1]
2. [Agenda item 2]
3. [Agenda item 3]

Please let me know if this time works for you, or suggest an alternative that fits your schedule.

Looking forward to connecting!

Best,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Request a meeting with a contact or customer

Name: Meeting Follow-Up
Subject: Summary & Next Steps from Our Meeting
Body:
Hi {{ContactName}},

Thank you for taking the time to meet today. Here's a quick summary of our discussion:

Key Points Discussed:
- [Point 1]
- [Point 2]
- [Point 3]

Action Items:
- [Action 1] - Owner: [Name] - Due: [Date]
- [Action 2] - Owner: [Name] - Due: [Date]

Next Steps:
- [Next step]

Please let me know if I've missed anything or if you have additional thoughts.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Send after a meeting to summarize discussion and action items

Name: Invoice / Payment Reminder
Subject: Payment Reminder - Invoice #{{InvoiceNumber}}
Body:
Dear {{CustomerName}},

This is a friendly reminder that invoice #{{InvoiceNumber}} is due on {{DueDate}}.

Invoice Details:
- Invoice #: {{InvoiceNumber}}
- Amount: ${{Amount}}
- Due Date: {{DueDate}}

Payment Methods:
- Bank Transfer: [Details]
- Online Payment: [Link]

If payment has already been sent, please disregard this notice.

Please contact us if you have any questions about this invoice.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Accounts Team
Description: Payment reminder for outstanding invoices

Name: Quarterly Business Review
Subject: Quarterly Business Review - {{Quarter}} {{Year}}
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

As part of our commitment to your success, I'd like to schedule our quarterly business review.

In this review, we'll cover:

1. Performance Summary
   - Key metrics and achievements
   - Service utilization overview

2. Feedback & Satisfaction
   - Your experience with our team
   - Areas for improvement

3. Roadmap & Opportunities
   - Upcoming features and services
   - Growth opportunities

4. Action Plan
   - Goals for next quarter
   - Resource allocation

Please let me know your availability for a 45-minute meeting in the next two weeks.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Schedule and outline quarterly business review meetings

Name: Product/Service Update
Subject: Exciting Updates from {{CompanyName}}
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

We're thrilled to share some exciting updates that we think you'll find valuable:

What's New:
- [Feature/Update 1]: [Brief description]
- [Feature/Update 2]: [Brief description]
- [Feature/Update 3]: [Brief description]

How This Benefits You:
- [Benefit 1]
- [Benefit 2]

Want to Learn More?
I'd be happy to schedule a quick demo or walkthrough. Just reply to this email or book a time on my calendar.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Announce product or service updates to contacts and customers

Name: Re-engagement
Subject: We Miss You, {{ContactName}}!
Body:
Hi {{ContactName}},

It's been a while since we last connected, and I wanted to reach out to see how things are going.

A lot has changed at {{CompanyName}} since we last spoke:

- [New offering 1]
- [New offering 2]
- [Achievement or milestone]

I'd love to catch up and explore how we might be able to help with any current challenges you're facing.

Would you have 15 minutes this week for a quick call?

Hope to hear from you!

Best,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Re-engage with inactive contacts or former customers

Name: Referral Request
Subject: A Quick Favor - Know Anyone Who Could Benefit?
Body:
Hi {{ContactName}},

I hope you've been happy with our partnership! I'm reaching out because we're looking to help more organizations like yours.

Do you know anyone in your network who might benefit from our services? We'd be grateful for any introductions.

As a thank you, we offer [referral incentive] for successful referrals.

No pressure at all - just thought I'd ask! If you'd like to refer someone, simply reply with their name and contact info, or forward this email to them.

Thank you for your continued trust in {{CompanyName}}.

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Ask satisfied customers for referrals

Name: Thank You Note
Subject: Thank You, {{ContactName}}!
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

I just wanted to take a moment to say thank you.

{{ThankYouReason}}

Your trust and partnership mean a great deal to us, and we're committed to continuing to deliver value.

Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything we can do for you.

With gratitude,
{{SenderName}}
Description: General purpose thank you note for any occasion

Name: Contract Renewal Reminder
Subject: Your Contract Renewal is Coming Up
Description: Remind customers about upcoming contract renewals

Name: Event Invitation
Subject: You're Invited: {{EventName}}
Description: Invite contacts to events, webinars, or conferences

Name: Feedback Request
Subject: We'd Love Your Feedback
Body:
Dear {{ContactName}},

Your opinion matters to us! We're always looking for ways to improve, and your feedback is invaluable.

Could you take a few minutes to share your thoughts on:

1. How satisfied are you with our products/services? (1-10)
2. What do we do well?
3. Where can we improve?
4. Would you recommend us to others?

You can simply reply to this email with your responses, or if you prefer, I can schedule a quick call.

Thank you in advance for helping us serve you better!

Best regards,
{{SenderName}}
Description: Request feedback from customers to improve services
